Module SpiderCrisis
Package Main

Class Room

java.lang.Object
Main.Room
public class Room extends Object
Date: May 31, 2023

Version 1.0 of the Room class, a class to represent a room in Evan's house. Provided by JELTech Industries.

Version:
23.06.08
Author:
Lexi Han

Class: ICS4UO with V. Krasteva

  • Method Details

    • inExitZone

      public boolean inExitZone(Player p)
      Method to check if a Player is in one of the exit zones of the Room.
      Parameters:
      p - the Player to check.
      Returns:
      True if the Player is in an exit zone.

    • inCheckZone

      public boolean inCheckZone(Player p)
      Method to check if a Player is in one of the check zones of the Room.
      Parameters:
      p - The current Player.
      Returns:
      The current check zone the Player is in.

    • validMove

      public boolean validMove(Player p, int xDir, int yDir)
      Method to check if a player can move here.
      Parameters:
      p - The player to investigate.
      xDir - the amount moved in the x-direction.
      yDir - the amount moved in the y-direction.
      Returns:
      True if the player can move in the direction given.

    • clearedRoom

      public boolean clearedRoom()
      Method determining if a player has successfully cleared the room.
      Returns:
      True if there are no more spiders in the room.

      Parameters:
      s - Spider to be added.

      ra - RoomArea class representing the area to be checked.

    • addExitZone

      public void addExitZone(Rectangle r, Image arrow)
      Method to add an exit zone to the Room.
      Parameters:
      r - The boundaries where the exit zone is.
      arrow - The direction the arrow is to face, indicating the direction of the exit.

      public Rectangle getCurrExitZone(Player p)
      Method to return the current exit zone a Player is standing in.
      Parameters:
      p - A player object.
      Returns:
      The exit zone the player is in, or null if they are not in an exit zone.
